cards.name: Attuma
cards.ability: After each turn, destroy one of your cards here with less Power.

cards.name: Beast
cards.ability: On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. They cost 1 less next turn.

cards.name: Cannonball
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move the highest-Power enemy card here away. If you can't, destroy it with a Rock.

cards.name: Copycat
cards.ability: When you draw this, copy the text from the bottom card of your opponent's deck.

cards.name: Destroyer
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy your cards at other locations.

cards.name: Loki
cards.ability: On Reveal: Replace your deck with your opponent's starting deck. Give those cards -1 Cost.

cards.name: Surtur
cards.ability: After you play a card with 10+ Power, this gains +4 Power.

cards.name: Taskmaster
cards.ability: On Reveal: Set this card's Power equal to that of the last card you played. (if that card's in play)

items.title: Deadpool League
items: 1st - Deadpool Emote, Premium Mystery Variant, 2x Matte Black Borders, 310 Boosters
2nd - Deadpool Emote, Mystery Variant, Matte Black Border, 310 Boosters
3rd - Deadpool Emote, Mystery Variant, Neon Blue Border, 310 Boosters
4th-5th - Mystery Variant, Neon Blue Border, 310 Boosters
6th-10th - Mystery Variant, Neon Blue Border, 155 Boosters
11th-15th - Mystery Variant, Neon Blue Border, 105 Boosters

items.title: Jeff Week
items: Enjoy Jeff-themed variants, login bonuses, Twitch drops, Alliance bounties, and rewards

items.title: Jeff League
items: 1st - Premium Mystery Variant, 3x Red Matte Borders, 310 Jeff Boosters
2nd - Mystery Variant, 2x Red Matte Border, 310 Jeff Boosters
3rd - Mystery Variant, Red Matte Border, 310 Jeff Boosters
4th-5th - Mystery Variant, Purple Neon Border, 310 Jeff Boosters
6th-10th - Mystery Variant, Purple Neon Border, 155 Jeff Boosters
11th-15th - Purple Neon Border, 105 Jeff Boosters

items.name: Arishem
changes: 7/7 - At the start of the game, +1 Max Energy. Shuffle 12 random cards into your deck.
7/7 - At the start of the game, +1 Max Energy. Shuffle 15 random cards into your deck.

items.name: Cassandra Nova
changes: 3/1 - On Reveal: Steal 1 Power from each card in your opponent's deck.

items.name: Mind Stone
changes: 2/1 - On Reveal: Draw 2 Stones from your deck.

items.name: Thena
changes: 2/1 - After each turn, +3 Power if you played (exactly) 2 cards.

items.name: Sandman
changes: 5/7 - On Reveal: Players can only play 1 card next turn.

items.name: Lady Deathstrike
changes: 5/6 - On Reveal: Destroy each card here with 3 or less Power.

items.name: Man-Thing
changes: 4/5 - Ongoing: 1, 2, and 3-Cost cards here have -2 Power.

items.name: Nocturne
changes: 3/5 - You can move this once. When this moves, replace its location with a random new one.

items.name: Angel
changes: 1/2 - When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your hand or deck to replace it.

items.name: Shadow King (text only)
changes: 2/2 – On Reveal: Set all cards here to their base Power.
2/2 – On Reveal: Reset all cards here to their original Power.

items.name: Moon Knight (text only)
changes: 3/3 – On Reveal: Discard a card with an even Cost from each player’s hand.
3/3 – On Reveal: Discard an even-costed card from each player’s hand.

items.name: Baron Zemo (text only)
changes: 3/5 – On Reveal: Recruit the lowest-Cost card from your opponent’s deck to your side of this location.
3/5 – On Reveal: Recruit a card that costs the least from your opponent’s deck to your side of this location.

items.name: Weirdworld
changes: Both players draw from their opponent’s decks.
Draw 2 cards from your opponent’s deck.

items.name: The Sandbar
changes: Cards with abilities can’t be played here.
Cards that didn’t start in your deck cost 1 more. (max 6)

items.name: Fogwell’s Gym
changes: Now stacks with itself and provides many boosters if copied by an effect such as Legion

items.name: Lamentis-1, The Peak, District X
changes: Lamentis-1, The Peak - Locations removed | District X - Will no longer appear for most players, but will still show up for early players

items.name: Attuma
changes: 4/10 – If you have another card here at the end of your turn, destroy this.
4/10 - After each turn, destroy one of your cards here with less Power.

items.name: Loki
changes: 3/5 – On Reveal: Replace your deck with your opponent's starting deck. Give those cards -1 Cost and draw a card.
2/2 - On Reveal: Replace your deck with your opponent's starting deck. Give those cards -1 Cost.

items.name: Copycat
changes: 3/5 – When you draw this, steal the text from the bottom card of your opponent's deck.
3/5 - When you draw this, copy the text from the bottom card of your opponent's deck.

items.name: Beast
changes: 2/2 – On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. They cost 1 less next turn.

items.name: Taskmaster
changes: 5/0 – On Reveal: Set this card's Power equal to that of the last card you played. (if that card's in play)

items.name: Cannonball
changes: 5/7 – On Reveal: Move the highest-Power enemy card here away. If you can't, destroy it with a Rock.

items.name: Destroyer
changes: 6/16 – On Reveal: Destroy your other cards.
6/14 – On Reveal: Destroy your cards at other locations.
